Headline: Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute near Narragansett/Addison
ShortDescription: SB 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temp rerouted via Narragansett, Addison, Auston, Belmont, Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Addison

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Addison, Auston, Belmont, and Narragansett due to, street blockage near Narragansett/Addison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Thomas
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, Augusta, and Austin due to Street blockage near Austin/Thomas.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, Augusta, and Austin due to Street blockage near Austin/Thomas.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Monroe
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Monroe due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Monroe due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
